sentences.en: 30 per cent of psychiatric hospital beds are occupied by people of no fixed abode.
sentences.cn: 精神病院30%的床位是被无家可归者占据的。

sentences.en: About 4% of the prison population have chronic psychiatric illnesses.
sentences.cn: 大约4%的犯人有慢性精神疾病。

sentences.en: Arthur's drinking caused him to be committed to a psychiatric hospital.
sentences.cn: 阿瑟由于酗酒被送进一家精神病医院。

sentences.en: Charles was suffering from a psychiatric disorder (= mental illness ) .
He landed in a psychiatric ward.
He's been committed to a private psychiatric hospital in Newark.
sentences.cn: 他已被收进纽瓦克的一家私立精神病院.

sentences.en: Her childhood was overshadowed by her mother's incarceration in a psychiatric hospital.
sentences.cn: 她的母亲被关在精神病院，这给她的童年蒙上了阴影。

sentences.en: Kids at that time brought cartoons into the age of psychiatric help.
sentences.cn: 那个时期的孩子们需要卡通来慰藉他们的精神世界.

sentences.en: Objective To study quality of life of nurse in psychiatric hospital.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨精神病医院护士的生命质量.

sentences.en: Outcomes for psychiatric disorders no better than in the Victorian period.
sentences.cn: 现在精神病的诊治结果并不比维多利亚时代的好.

sentences.en: She received psychiatric care as an outpatient.
sentences.cn: 她作为门诊病人接受了精神科护理。

sentences.en: The course leads to a diploma in psychiatric nursing.
sentences.cn: 读完这门课程可以获得精神病护理文凭.

sentences.en: The inquiry team criticises staff at the psychiatric hospital for the low standard of care.
sentences.cn: 调查小组批评该精神病院的员工护理水平低劣。

sentences.en: This is a disease of psychiatric origin in which the patient refuses to eat.
sentences.cn: 这是一种心理上的疾病,患这种病的人不肯吃东西.

sentences.en: We finally insisted that he seek psychiatric help.
sentences.cn: 我们最后坚持要求他寻求精神科医师的帮助。

sentences.en: Who spent the last 20 years of his life in a psychiatric institution?
sentences.cn: 那他最后的20年谁替他去精神病院?

words.tran_cn: 精神病治疗的；精神病学的
精神的；心灵的；灵魂的；超自然的
影响心理状态的；作用于精神的
精神分析的；心理分析的
精神病学家，精神病医生
精神病学；精神病治疗法
心理分析，精神分析；精神病患者
精神分析学家；心理分析学家

trans.tran_cn: 精神病学的，精神病治疗的
trans.tran_en: relating to the study and treatment of mental illness
